results.name: Expansion of (1-x)^(-1)/(1 + x - x^2 + x^3).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,-2,1)
mathematica: a=0; b=0; c=0; lst={}; Do[z=a+b+c+1; AppendTo[lst,z]; a=b; b=c; c=z; z=a+b+c-1; AppendTo[lst,z]; a=b; b=c; c=z,{n,5!}]; lst(*Abs values*) (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 17 2010 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
